description: The softest hardshell refined for ski mountaineering. Waterproof and breathable, this packable, lightweight Proflex™ shell has deep pockets for skins and a ski helmet compatible hood. Strategically positioned through vents offer uphill comfort.
name: Rab Khroma Kinetic Jacket - Mens

specs.key: 20D Proflex™ Stretch Woven Nylon 3-layer Waterproof Technology with fluorocarbon-free DWR (149g/m²) HH
